text: Rajalakshmi, a teacher, lost her gold chain weighing close to three sovereigns to snatchers near railway unction on Friday. Police said she was a resident of Anbu Nagar, Tirupalai. Two persons with full-mask helmets committed the crime. Though she held back the chain, they snatched a portion of the chain and escaped. Thilagar Thidal police have filed a case.
title: Chain snatched
